gui package¶

Submodules¶

gui.app module¶

class gui.app.App¶

Bases: Tk

Tkinter graphical application, wrapper around the main logic in MainBody

class gui.app.MainBody(container: App)¶

Bases: Frame

Main body of the application

Container for UI components Manages the main logic of watermarking photos and displaying status messages

set_error_message(message: str) → None¶

Display error status message

Parameters:

message – text to display

Returns:

None

set_success_message(message: str) → None¶

Display success status message

Parameters:

message – text to display

Returns:

None

watermark_photos() → None¶

Add watermarks to files in the selected directory and display appropriate status message. All Exceptions are handled on this level

Returns:

None

Bases: Frame

UI component for selecting a directory with photos to process and a button initiating processing TODO: refactor - single responsibility

browse_directories() → None¶

Open a system pop-up window to select a folder

get_directory() → str¶

Get the selected directory’s path

Returns:

path to the selected directory

gui.config_menu module¶

class gui.config_menu.ConfigMenu(container: Frame, display_error: Callable)¶

Bases: Frame

UI component for setting configuration parameters: watermarks, width, height, opacity and corners where watermarks will be placed

Get selected corners.

Returns:

list of selected corners

get_dark_watermark_filepath() → str¶

Get dark watermark’s filepath

Returns:

filepath to the dark watermark

get_height() → float¶

Get selected height.

Returns:

max watermark height to image ratio

get_light_watermark_filepath() → str¶

Get light watermark’s filepath

Returns:

filepath to the light watermark

get_opacity() → float¶

Get selected opacity

Returns:

watermark opacity [0.0, 1.0]

get_width() → float¶

Get selected width.

Returns:

max watermark width to image ratio

gui.corner_menu module¶

Bases: Frame

list of selected corners

gui.proportion_widget module¶

exception gui.proportion_widget.InvalidProportionException¶

Bases: Exception

Raised if the user provides an invalid value for a proportion

class gui.proportion_widget.ProportionWidget(container: Frame, label: str, default_value: float)¶

Bases: Frame

UI component for selecting proportion values, between 0 and 1

get_value() → float¶

Get the value selected by user. Validates input.

Returns:

value selected by user

Raises:

InvalidProportionException – if the user provided an illegal value
